segment.source: Checklist Configuring Rules for the Encryption Zone (Windows 10)
segment.target: Checklist Configuring Rules for the Encryption Zone (Windows 10)

segment.source: Checklist Configuring Rules for the Encryption Zone
segment.target: Checklist Configuring Rules for the Encryption Zone

segment.source: Checklist: Configuring Rules for the Encryption Zone
segment.target: Checklist: Configuring Rules for the Encryption Zone

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview
segment.target: Windows Server 2016 Technical Preview

segment.source: This checklist includes tasks for configuring connection security rules and IPsec settings in your GPOs to implement the encryption zone in an isolated domain.
segment.target: This checklist includes tasks for configuring connection security rules and IPsec settings in your GPOs to implement the encryption zone in an isolated domain.

segment.source: Rules for the encryption zone are typically the same as those for the isolated domain, with the exception that the main rule requires encryption in addition to authentication.
segment.target: Rules for the encryption zone are typically the same as those for the isolated domain, with the exception that the main rule requires encryption in addition to authentication.

segment.source: Checklist: Configuring encryption zone rules
segment.target: Checklist: Configuring encryption zone rules

segment.source: This checklist assumes that you have already created the GPO for the isolated domain as described in Checklist: Implementing a Domain Isolation Policy Design.
segment.target: This checklist assumes that you have already created the GPO for the isolated domain as described in Checklist: Implementing a Domain Isolation Policy Design.

segment.source: You can then copy those GPOs for use with the encryption zone.
segment.target: You can then copy those GPOs for use with the encryption zone.

segment.source: After you create the copies, modify the main rule to require encryption in addition to the authentication required by the rest of the isolated domain.
segment.target: After you create the copies, modify the main rule to require encryption in addition to the authentication required by the rest of the isolated domain.

segment.source: Task
segment.target: Task

segment.source: Reference
segment.target: Reference

segment.source: Make a copy of the domain isolation GPOs to serve as a starting point for the GPOs for the encryption zone.
segment.target: Make a copy of the domain isolation GPOs to serve as a starting point for the GPOs for the encryption zone.

segment.source: Copy a GPO to Create a New GPO
segment.target: Copy a GPO to Create a New GPO

segment.source: Modify the group memberships and WMI filters so that they are correct for the encryption zone and the version of Windows for which this GPO is intended.
segment.target: Modify the group memberships and WMI filters so that they are correct for the encryption zone and the version of Windows for which this GPO is intended.

segment.source: Modify GPO Filters to Apply to a Different Zone or Version of Windows
segment.target: Modify GPO Filters to Apply to a Different Zone or Version of Windows

segment.source: Add the encryption requirements for the zone.
segment.target: Add the encryption requirements for the zone.

segment.source: Configure the Rules to Require Encryption
segment.target: Configure the Rules to Require Encryption

segment.source: Link the GPO to the domain level of the Active Directory organizational unit hierarchy.
segment.target: Link the GPO to the domain level of the Active Directory organizational unit hierarchy.

segment.source: Link the GPO to the Domain
segment.target: Link the GPO to the Domain

segment.source: Add your test computers to the membership group for the encryption zone.
segment.target: Add your test computers to the membership group for the encryption zone.

segment.source: Be sure to add at least one for each operating system supported by a different GPO in the group.
segment.target: Be sure to add at least one for each operating system supported by a different GPO in the group.

segment.source: Add Test Computers to the Membership Group for a Zone
segment.target: Add Test Computers to the Membership Group for a Zone

segment.source: Verify that the connection security rules are protecting network traffic.
segment.target: Verify that the connection security rules are protecting network traffic.

segment.source: Verify That Network Traffic Is Authenticated
segment.target: Verify That Network Traffic Is Authenticated
